headline: Packaging Corporation of America Schedules Conference Call to Discuss Third Quarter 2025 Operating Results
summary: LAKE FOREST, Ill., September 15, 2025--Packaging Corporation of America (NYSE: PKG) will hold a conference call on Thursday October 23, 2025 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time to discuss third quarter 2025 results. The conference call leader will be Mark Kowlzan. Third quarter earnings results will be released after the market closes on Wednesday October 22, 2025.
